instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
name: martini cocktail

instructions: Pour grenadine into glass, followed by beer, leaving pink-hued beer head on top
name: queen mary

instructions: The shot of sake is dropped into the beer, causing it to fizz violently.  The drink should then be consumed immediately.
name: sake bomb

instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
name: brandy alexander

instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
name: brandy manhattan

instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
name: brandy sour (cyprus)

instructions: Shake with ice in a cocktail shaker, then strain into a chilled Coupe glass and top with a splash of chilled club soda or seltzer.
name: brandy daisy

instructions: Shake or stir with ice.
name: chicago cocktail

instructions: Traditionally shaken into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.
name: jack rose

instructions: Combine and stir.
name: panama

instructions: Server straight up or on ice
name: b & b

instructions: Stir together and serve over ice.
name: incredible hulk

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: the blenheim

instructions: Stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass
name: bee's knees

instructions: Stir, strain, straight up, cocktail glass, garnish.
name: bijou

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: four score

ingredients: 1 spl Overproof rum (for garnish; see instructions)
instructions: Muddle, shake, fine strain into a coupe, garnish with a thin orange peel wrapped around another grape, dipped in 151-proof rum, and set aflame, then extinguished in the drink.
name: french connection

instructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
name: horse's neck

ingredients: Several drops of aromatic bitters at the end
instructions: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.[1]
name: pisco sour

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: savoy corpse reviver

instructions: Shake together over ice.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.
name: paradise

instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.
name: sidecar

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a pre-cooled cocktail glass.
name: alexander

ingredients: 1/4 measure orange curacao or triple sec
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass
name: damn the weather

instructions: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass, garnish
name: derby

instructions: Mix everything (except Chartreuse & Nutmeg)) with a lot of cracked ice, shake well and strain.  Float the Chartreuse on top with a spoon and add a dusting of the grated nutmeg
name: porto flip

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: savoy affair

instructions: Shake (or stir), strain, up.
name: angel face

instructions: Shake all but wine, strain into ice-filled highball glass, top with chilled wine.
name: french 75

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: my fair lady

instructions: Glassware: Collins or highballGarnish: Mint spring and swizzle stickPour ginger beer into glass. Shake remaining ingredients with cracked or cubed ice in shaker. Strain contents into glass, fill with more ice, and garnish.
name: suffering bastard

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: wolfram

instructions: Layer the two spirits in the shot glass, with the high-proof liquor on top.  Light the shot and allow it to burn; then extinguish it by dropping it into the beer glass. Drink immediately.
name: flaming doctor pepper

instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.
name: singapore sling

instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
name: stinger

instructions: Stir well in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish and serve
name: gibson

instructions: Stir & strain into a chilled glass
name: gimlet

instructions: Shake gin and grapefruit juice in cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass.
name: greyhound

instructions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Optionally garnish with lemon slice.[1]
name: long island iced tea

instructions: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass
name: monkey gland

instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
name: negroni

instructions: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.
name: caipirinha

instructions: Shake in an iced cocktail shaker, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
name: 20th century

instructions: Fill mixing glass with gin, vermouth, and bitters. Add ice and stir until chilled, then add strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.[1]
name: blackthorn

instructions: Shake all but soda water, strain over ice in a Collins, top with soda. Alternately, build in glass and give a quick stir.
name: john collins

instructions: In a shaker add white rum, Malibu, lime juice, some mint leaves and crushed ice, garnish with the sprig of mint.
name: cojito

instructions: Muddle lime wedges. Muddle mint lightly. Add ice, syrup, rum. Shake, fine strain into glass with more ice. Top with club soda, garnish with additional lime wedge and mint sprig.
name: mojito

ingredients: 3 cL (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice
6 cL (4 parts) carbonated water to taste
instructions: Mix the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish and serve.
name: juan collins

ingredients: 2 teaspoons white cane sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lime slice.
name: mojito blanco

instructions: Pour Jack Daniel's brand Tennessee whiskey into a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with Coca-Cola. Stir lightly.
name: jack and coke

instructions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.
name: mint julep

instructions: Stir the sugar into the lime in a cocktail shaker. Add other ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: jasper's jamaican

ingredients: 1 egg white or 20 ml aquafaba or 4 drops cocktail foamer
instructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.
name: clover club cocktail

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass, add mint.
name: cooperstown cocktail

instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
name: martini

ingredients: Half of a lime squeezed and dropped in the glass
instructions: Combine spirit, lime and shell in a highball or wine glass. Add ice, stir and then add sparkling mineral water.
name: lime rickey

instructions: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass rinsed with absinthe
name: corpse reviver #2

instructions: Shake all ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled martini or cocktail glass.
name: queens

instructions: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
name: daiquiri

ingredients: One part 7 Up, ginger ale, Sprite, or Mountain Dew
instructions: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved CO2.
name: tequila slammer

instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.
name: tequila sunrise

instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.
name: tequila sunset

instructions:
Pour Kahlua into shot glass
Layer Midori on top.
Carefully add Baileys, letting it float on top to finish.
name: quick fuck

ingredients: 1 oz Lime cordial (Toby Cecchini's; see link)
instructions: Shake, strain over cracked ice, garnish.
name: javanese daiquiri

ingredients: 11 3/10 oz Ginger liqueur, Domaine de Canton
1/2 oz Bitters (Smeby's Buddah's Hand Lemon and Kaffir Lime)
instructions: Add everything to a large punchbowl, float decorative block ice.
name: pacquiao's punch

ingredients: 3/4 oz Sweet vermouth, Carpano Punt e Mes
instructions: Stir, strain into old fashioned glass with a large cube or sphere. No garnish.
name: five point palm exploding heart technique

instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
name: aviation

instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with cubed ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
name: pegu

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: royal arrival

instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.
name: takumi's aviation

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
name: vesper martini

ingredients: 1 US fluid ounce (30 ml) light rum
4 US fluid ounces (120 ml) orange juice
2 US fluid ounces (60 ml) lemon juice, unsweetened
instructions: Combine ingredients except overproof rum with 2 scoops of crushed ice in a blender. Pour, and place small amount of overproof rum into volcano and carefully light.
name: flaming volcano

instructions: Combine and stir.
name: brave bull

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: the last word

instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.
name: white lady

instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
name: between the sheets

instructions: Combine all ingredients with ice, stir or shake, then pour into a hurricane glass with the ice. For garnish score pineapple or orange slice with a knife and insert onto rim of glass; optionally use toothpick or cocktail umbrella to spear maraschino cherry through center and attach to top of fruit slice; otherwise float cherry on top of ice!
name: blue hawaii

instructions: Blend all the ingredients together in a blender, including the ice, and then strain into a hurricane glass. Place cherry on top of the drink as a garnish and serve. Whipped cream can also be added as a garnish to the top of the drink before the cherry.[1]
name: bushwacker

instructions: Mix in pitcher with crushed ice, shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Serves 6.
name: rum swizzle

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass
name: yellow bird

instructions: Pour into cocktail shaker all ingredients with ice cubes, shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail or martini glass.
name: bronx

instructions: Stir, strain, up, twist.
name: tuxedo

instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.
name: sex on the beach

instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: nixon

instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
name: vieux carré

ingredients: One part cola or another carbonated soft drink
instructions: Stir together over plenty of ice.
name: kalimotxo

ingredients: 1 ds Celery bitters, Bittermens Orchard Street Celery Shrub
instructions: Stir with ice, strain and garnish with a lemon twist.
name: oxford comma

ingredients: 1/2 oz Simple syrup (or up to 3/4 oz to taste)
instructions: Pack lowball glass with cracked ice. In a second lowball or mixing glass, stir ingredient with ice, empty serving glass and rinse with Absinthe, strain and serve without ice. May also be served in a flute or cocktail glass
name: sazerac

instructions: Stir, strain, cocktail, orange twist
name: martinez

instructions: Shake ouzo and fresh juices vigorously together, coat the rim of a glass with powdered sugar and pour drink into glass over ice, and add dash of bitters. Garnish with a thin orange slice and serve.
name: ouzini

ingredients: 15 ml Donn's Mix (2 parts fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part cinnamon syrup)
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Pour into a tall tumbler glass.
name: zombie

instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.
name: ginza mary

ingredients: One raw egg (or egg yolk only)
instructions: Whisk the raw egg yolk and honey/sugar into 3/4 cup hot sake (hot enough to lightly cook the egg – 1:30 in the microwave).
name: tamagozake

instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.
name: arizona biltmore

instructions: Combine and stir.
name: bloody aztec

instructions: Combine all three ingredients into a chilled glass and serve with ice and garnish.
name: fizzy apple cocktail
